mapper.select: select s.id schoolId, s.name, s.shortName, s.areaId,plan.recruitPlan,plan.recruitCount from u_user u join b_school_teacher b on u.id = b.userId join m_school s on b.schoolId = s.id join b_school_recruit_plan plan on s.id = plan.schoolId where plan.seasonId = #{seasonId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select plan.id planId,plan.recruitplan recruitPlan,school.id schoolId,school.name,plan.recruitCount, plan.gkPeople, plan.technicalPeople, plan.undergraduatePeople from m_school school left join b_school_recruit_plan plan on plan.schoolId = school.id and plan.seasonId = #{seasonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
school.name like "%"#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
